author: Alemas
title: My very first LEGO set ever!
review:
This was the set that started it all! A box of Duplo bricks! I remember it more playing with it when I was... 4 or 5 years old! It only contains basic Duplo bricks!

Pros
- Lots of bricks
- Fun
- Compatible with normal System bricks

Cons
-None!

Overall, a great set for little kids!
